entry.title: Inductive RGB Spark Plug Sensor.
entry.summary:
Introduction

This project is inspired by this one:. Inductive Spark Plug Sensor

Shopping List

Inductive Sensor 1. XSolid Hookup wire 2. X(2) 1N4007 3. X(2) 10K Ohm Resistors 4. X(1) 100nF Cap 5. X(1) 5.1V zener diode 6. X(1) 1N4148 7. X(1) 2N3904 8. X(1) 4.7K Ohm Resistor

Power Supply 1. X(1) 1N4007 2. X(2) 220uF Caps 3. X(2) 100nF Caps 4. X(1) LM7805 5. Some means of providing 12V.

Pulse Counter 1. X(1) SN74LS14N 2. X(2) 1nF Caps

Keep an eye out on my instructable page for this project. Going to connect the sensor to some RGB LEDs and interpret the the rpm as a color.
